main_definition: A paper or digital document used to advertise, promote an event, or convey information quickly.

meanings_and_examples.example: The local bakery distributed a flyer offering 50% off on their pastries for the weekend.
During health awareness month, a hospital handed out flyers with information about preventive care practices.
At the community fair, food vendors gave away free samples as part of their flyer-based promotional strategy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A paper aircraft used for entertainment or demonstration
meanings_and_examples.example: Children at a park were fascinated by how far and long the colorful flyers flew when they threw them into the air.
